unauthenticated.noAccount: If you do not have a GC Forms account,
unauthenticated.title: Sign in to access responses

card.noResponsesToDownload: There are no responses available to download.

notifications.trySelectingLessFilesHeader: Only {{max}} responses can be downloaded at a time.
notifications.trySelectingLessFiles: You have {{max}} responses selected. Uncheck at least 1 response before downloading.
notifications.atLeastOneFileHeader: At least one file must be selected to download.
notifications.atLeastOneFile: Try selecting at least one file to download.
notifications.errorDownloadingFiles: Try again in a few minutes. If the problem persists contact support.

confirmReceiptDialog.title: Confirm receipt of responses
confirmReceiptDialog.findCode: Find the confirmation code on the bottom of the downloaded form response. It looks like: c0c42c90-b816-49da-a69a-80bfd8ba15db.
confirmReceiptDialog.copyCode: Copy and paste up to {{max}} confirmation codes, one per line.
confirmReceiptDialog.responsesAvailableFor: After you confirm receipt, responses will be available for 7 days then automatically removed from our database.

minEntries.title: At least one response must be specified
minEntries.description: Enter the confirmation codes for responses that you've received.

maxEntries.title: Only {{max}} responses can be reported at a time.
maxEntries.description: Enter these form entries before entering more.

errorEntries.title: An error occurred with the below confirm receipt codes
errorEntries.description: Please double check the entries are entered correct and try again. Any valid entries were removed from the below list and successfully submitted.

invalidEntry.title: The confirmation code entered is invalid
invalidEntry.description: Please try entereing the confirmation code again.

unknown.title: Something went wrong
unknown.description: Try submitting the confirm receipt codes again in a few minutes or contact

reportProblemsDialog.title: Report a problem with responses
reportProblemsDialog.findForm: Find the form number in the form list for any responses that will not download or open. They look like, 31-12-XCRV.
reportProblemsDialog.enterFormNumbers: Enter up-to {{max}} form numbers, one per line.
reportProblemsDialog.problemReported: After you report the problem, we will contact you to help resolve the problem.

minEntries.title: At least one form number must be specified
minEntries.description: Enter the form number for responses that you've received.

maxEntries.title: Only {{max}} form number can be reported at a time.
maxEntries.description: Enter these form numbers before entering more.

errorEntries.title: An error occurred with the below form number
errorEntries.description: Please double check the form numbers are entered correct and try again. Any valid form numbers were removed from the below list and successfully submitted.

invalidEntry.title: The form number entered is invalid
invalidEntry.description: Please try entereing the form number again.

unknown.title: Something went wrong
unknown.description: Try submitting the form numbers again in a few minutes or contact
